question:
1. You successfully passed a job interview. You are expected to start on November 15, but you will not
be available on that date.
Write a letter to your new boss. In your letter
 explain your situation
 express your concern
 suggest a solution
Write at least 150 words.
You do NOT need to write any addresses.
Begin your letter as follows:
Dear ………………….. ,
text: I am Reagan Dooley and by last week I was offered an appointment letter, which mentioned my date of joining as November 15. I am writing because, unfortunately, I will not be able to present myself on that date.
I am suffering from viral fever for the past one week and I am hospitalized for the same reason. Further, the doctor had advised me to take complete rest for the next two weeks.
Hence, I will not be able to work until November 20 and I could also submit a copy of doctor's certificate if required at the time of joining, which will be by November 21.

Please excuse me for the delay in joining. Most importantly, I assure to complete my onboarding procedures as to complete as soon as possible, therefore I will be able to support the project activities as per the schedule.
I sincerely apologies for the inconvience and I hope this will not affect our relationship.
